医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
实验室管理的演变：与牛津仪器深入探讨 OI 视图了解 OI View 如何提供实时见解、彻底改变实验室管理并提高牛津仪器用户的工作效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/The-evolution-of-lab-management-A-deep-dive-into-OI-view-with-Oxford-Instruments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/The-evolution-of-lab-management-A-deep-dive-into-OI-view-with-Oxford-Instruments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2a594fc-15d3-439b-98a1-a4e6b1f18046 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 10:04:00 -0400 The evolution of lab management: A deep dive into OI view with Oxford Instruments
研究探讨主动导航和沉浸式环境对情景记忆的影响就像时间机器一样，情景记忆使我们能够在脑海中回到过去，并完全清晰地重温个人经历，就好像我们再次经历它们一样。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Study-explores-impact-of-active-navigation-and-immersive-environments-on-episodic-memory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Study-explores-impact-of-active-navigation-and-immersive-environments-on-episodic-memory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=581b6fae-1ab4-4add-bc21-960537809c9e Tue, 15 Oct 2024 10:01:00 -0400 Study explores impact of active navigation and immersive environments on episodic memory
工作场所的耻辱会影响管理者支持员工的能力当有心理健康问题的员工需要支持时，管理者不仅会受到自己对心理健康的看法的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Stigma-in-the-workplace-affects-managers-ability-to-support-employees.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Stigma-in-the-workplace-affects-managers-ability-to-support-employees.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf665f29-fbff-4f8a-9c2c-bf973043d0ee Tue, 15 Oct 2024 09:51:00 -0400 Stigma in the workplace affects managers' ability to support employees
塔拉胶在抗癌药物的药物输送应用中显示出潜力宣布在《BIO Integration》杂志上发表一篇新文章。天然多糖塔拉胶 (TG) 已被研究用于多种生物用途。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Tara-gum-shows-潜在-in-the-drug-delivery-application-of-anticancer-medications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Tara-gum-shows-pottial-in-the-drug-delivery-application-of-anticancer-medications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5d87c4a-3db2-4691-a860-7901e772888f Tue, 15 Oct 2024 09:42:00 -0400
研究强调肌肉减少症对老年糖尿病患者的影响随着全球人口老龄化，2 型糖尿病及其相关并发症（例如肌肉减少症）的患病率持续上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Study-highlights-sarcopenias-impact-on-elderly-病人-with-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Study-highlights-sarcopenias-impact-on-elderly-病人-with-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ec8da75-558d-4065-84b6-e88e6bae274e Tue, 15 Oct 2024 09:34:32 -0400 Study highlights sarcopenia's impact on elderly patients with diabetes
年龄影响对气温升高的情绪反应当外界气温升高时，人们往往会失去冷静。这种联系众所周知，但华盛顿州立大学领导的一项研究发现，对热的情绪反应是高度个体化的，只有一个因素可以调节它——年龄。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Age-influences-emotional-reactions-to-rising-temporals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Age-influences-emotional-reactions-to-rising-Temperatures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5cec341c-1f9f-4b1d-a02e-a3ac720e4fd9 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 09:22:15 -0400 Age influences emotional reactions to rising temperatures
肥胖与中东女性心血管风险增加有关肥胖是中东地区一项普遍存在的公共卫生挑战，该地区 54.2% 的女性和 31.4% 的男性患病率一直很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Obesity-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-risks-in-Middle-Eastern-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Obesity-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-risks-in-Middle-Eastern-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2ee8121-610c-43f3-aade-d225e6cf04f7 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 09:02:30 -0400 Obesity linked to increased cardiovascular risks in Middle Eastern women
研究呼吁对社区护士进行压疮强制培训萨里大学的研究人员在一项新研究中敦促社区护士需要接受强制性培训，以发现深色肤色患者的压疮（也称为褥疮）迹象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Study-calls-for-mandatory-training-on-Pressure-ulcers-for-community-nurses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Study-calls-for-mandatory-training-on-Pressure-ulcers-for-community-nurses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f82d7e8b-1056-426e-869b-9070b1c73a47 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 08:59:21 -0400 Study calls for mandatory training on pressure ulcers for community nurses
更具侵袭性的癌症中的染色体外 DNA 可能成为未来治疗的目标耶鲁大学医学院的耶鲁癌症中心研究人员于 10 月 14 日在《自然遗传学》上发表的研究发现，在更具侵袭性和晚期的癌症中，一种特定类型的 DNA（染色体外或 ecDNA）浓度更高，这可能将它们标记为未来的目标疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Extrachromosomal-DNA-in-more-aggressive-cancers-could-be-targets-for-future-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Extrachromosomal-DNA-in-more-aggressive-cancers-could-be-targets-for-future-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e01e763f-ae51-4766-b4c5-7ee5f20b7e05 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 08:41:00 -0400 Extrachromosomal DNA in more aggressive cancers could be targets for future therapies
新成像技术增强了对活体类器官的实时观察类器官是模仿人体器官结构和功能的 3D 微型器官，在疾病研究和药物开发中发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/New-imaging-technology-enhances-real-time-observation-of-living-organoids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/New-imaging-technology-enhances-real-time-observation-of-living-organoids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=955ae5d7-4a03-4877-bd32-ecfebb500981 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 08:36:48 -0400 New imaging technology enhances real-time observation of living organoids
